# Castigate (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Language-Dependent Spells|language-dependent]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level or 1 round; see text

**Saving Throw:** Will partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 210

You compel the target to beg for forgiveness. On a failed save, the target cowers with fear. On a successful save, it is [[Shaken|shaken]] for 1 round. Each round on its turn, a [[Cowering|cowering]] subject may attempt a new save to end the effect. A creature who worships the same god as you takes a â€“2 penalty on its saving throw.
